Name: CLDF dataset derived from Barlow's "Numerals of the Pacific" from 2025
Citation: Barlow, Russell (ed.). 2025. Numerals of the Pacific: A collection of numeral terms in Austronesian and Papuan languages.

Name: CLDF dataset derived from Bowern et al.'s "Diversity in the Numeral Systems of Australian Languages" from 2012
Citation: Bowern, Claire, and Jason Zentz (2012): Diversity in the Numeral Systems of Australian Languages. Anthropological Linguistics, 2012. http://www.jstor.org/stable/23621076

Name: CLDF dataset derived from Mamta's "South Asian Numerals Database" from 2024
Citation: Mamta, K. (2024): South Asian Numerals Database (SAND). Leipzig: Max Planck Institute for Evolutionary Anthropology.

Name: CLDF dataset derived from curated Chan's "Numeral Systems of the World's Languages" from 2019
Citation: Chan, Eugene (eds.) 2019. Numeral Systems of the World's Languages (curated). https://lingweb.eva.mpg.de/channumerals - accessed: 2019-09-30

Name: CLDF dataset derived from Ritchie et al.'s "UniNum: A Database of Number Names for 186 Languages" from 2019
Citation: Ritchie, S., Sproat, R., Gorman, K., van Esch, D., Schallhart, C., Bampounis, N., Brard, B., Mortensen, J. F., Holt, M., and Mahon, E. 2019. Unified verbalization for speech recognition & synthesis across languages. In Proc. INTERSPEECH, pages 3530-3534.
